definition: a covering, usually of cloth, that serves as a roof to shelter an area from the weather, to cover with a canopy
details:
noun
- a covering, usually of cloth, that serves as a roof to shelter an area from the weather
= example: a covering, usually of cloth, that serves as a roof to shelter an area from the weather
- the umbrellalike part of a parachute that fills with air
- the transparent covering of an aircraft cockpit
verb
- to cover with a canopy
